product_name: A Kayaker's Guide to the Hudson River Valley
long_description: Explore the quiet waters of the Hudson River Valley by paddle with this concise guide. Author: Shari Aber. Softcover; 224 pages; black-and-white photos and maps. Black Dome Press Corp.; copyright 2007. Author covers 33 paddles in Dutchess, Orange, Ulster, Greene, Columbia, Putnam, Westchester and Sullivan counties. Includes 37 Hudson valley lakes, ponds and reservoirs. Each entry includes a detailed topo map, the route, total mileage, difficulty, setting and hazards. Also includes detailed driving directions to the put-in.
short_description: Explore the quiet waters of the Hudson River Valley by paddle with this concise guide.
